name: Al Mu'min
description: Al Mu'min is one of the Names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The Granter of Security' or 'The Infuser of Faith'.
summary: Al Mu'min signifies Allah's role in providing peace, safety, and faith to His creatures. It emphasizes His ability to grant security not only in a worldly sense but also in the spiritual realm, instilling belief within hearts. This name is derived from the Arabic root word 'aman', which means security and faith. It reflects Allah's mercy and protection over His creations.
